## 

```{r}
library(lterdatasampler)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
View(pie_crab)
```

```{r}
#| fig-cap: "this is my caption"

ggplot(pie_crab, aes(x = latitude, y = size)) +
  geom_point()

  
```
```{r}
pie_crab %>% group_by(site) %>% 
  summarise(mean = round(mean(size), 2),
            standard_dev = sd(size),
            sample_size = n())
            
```
